sentences.en: A new method to measure lattice parameters is presented.
sentences.cn: 提出了精测点阵参数的一种新方法.

sentences.en: An ion may be noticeably displaced from its lattice position.
sentences.cn: 离子都可能显著地偏离它的位置.

sentences.en: By using the lattice - rotation model, the screw and edge dislocation densities of the samples were calculated.
sentences.cn: 通过使用晶格旋转(Lattice-rotation)模型拟合, 计算出样品的螺位错密度和刃位错密度.

sentences.en: Concept lattice is the core data structure of formal concept analysis.
sentences.cn: 概念格是形式概念分析中的核心数据结构.

sentences.en: Lattice paths counting problem is one of important combinatorial enumerative problems.
sentences.cn: 格路计数问题是组合计数中比较重要的问题之一.

sentences.en: Moment turning self head a lattice arrive at forever.
sentences.cn: 回头的瞬间.定格到永远.

sentences.en: Only large cations with low charge give a stable ionic lattice with the large polyhalide ions.
sentences.cn: 仅仅带低电荷的大的阳离子,能和大的多卤化物离子产生稳定的离子晶格.

sentences.en: The displacement tendency for each lattice site is indicated by arrow line.
sentences.cn: 界面层上格点位移的方向由以该格点为始点的带箭头线段示出.

sentences.en: The method about getting lattice information of LED display screen is introduced.
sentences.cn: 介绍了异步式LED显示屏点阵信息的获取方法.

sentences.en: The probability of obtaining a lattice atom displacement via the phonon kick process is evidently small.
sentences.cn: 很明显,通过声子反冲过程而取得晶格原子位移的几率是不大的.

sentences.en: The study of a rubber mould for lattice structure was presented.
sentences.cn: 介绍了一种网格结构用橡胶模具的研究.

sentences.en: The surface area of crystalline clay minerals is highly dependent on the extent of lattice expansion.
sentences.cn: 结晶粘土矿物的表面积主要依赖于晶格膨胀的程度.

sentences.en: The user can then explore the lattice by using specified criteria, such as support and confidence bounds, or by placing restrictions on the antecedent sequence.
sentences.cn: 用户然后可以使用指定的条件（比如支持和置信界限），或在先前的序列上设置限制来分析该格子。

sentences.en: This " lattice analogy'seeks to capitalize on well - established methods for analysis of framed structures.
sentences.cn: 搞这种 “ 格架模型”是为了可以利用成熟的分析钢架结构方法.

sentences.en: We were crawling along the narrow steel lattice of the bridge.
sentences.cn: 我们沿着桥上狭窄的钢制格架往前爬。

sentences.en: Where we find any reflections at all determines the lattice type.
sentences.cn: 只要最终发现任何反射,就可确定点阵类型.

words.tran_cn: 装有格子的；制成格状的

phrases.tran_cn: 立方晶格；立方格子；立方点阵

trans.tran_cn: 格子框架，类似格子框架的设计
trans.tran_en: a pattern or structure made of long pieces of wood, plastic etc that cross each other so that the spaces between them are shaped like diamonds
